subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
organizations: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
lead_paragraph: Chambers Bay Golf Course, which was completed in 2007 with the Open in mind, has three defining features that will set the tournament apart from its predecessors.
snippet: Chambers Bay Golf Course, which was completed in 2007 with the Open in mind, has three defining features that will set the tournament apart from its predecessors.
